amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for any activity that promotes the legalization of controlled substances except those drugs with medical evidence of a therapeutic advantage.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 16 in the Congressional Record of July 9, 1996. to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to promote the legalization of any controlled substance.
